In England, in the seven days to 12 November, there were 212,853 new confirmed cases (376.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 November, there were 201,776 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 5% (11,077 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 November is 8,205,448 (14,510 cases per 100,000 population).
